description: HotelsByMe is a complete full service Palm application that will allow you to find and book hotel properties worldwide.  The property searches return real-time availability and rates, while the booking process is secure and fast. We are a Hotels.com / Expedia Affiliate Network partner giving you access to the best hotel inventory worldwide and great customer service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.  Features: * Easily search for hotels worldwide or find hotels near your current location * View Hotel List and Hotel Location and Landmarks Google Maps * Sort by Our Picks, Price, Star Rating or Hotel Name * Filter by Amenities, Star Ratings and/or Property Type * View property descriptions and photos * Book via the phone or call a trained agent * Over 44,000 hotels offering special internet rates * 24/7 call center and customer support  If you have problems or concerns with your reservation, please click on the "Contact Us" link at www.hotelsbyme.com or call 1-800-997-4395 in US & Canada and 00-800-11-20-11-40 in Europe with Discount Code 260453.  If you want to report problems with the application, please email us at support@hotelsbyme.com
